name: Icy Flower
description:
Icy Flower is a elimination game where you break groups of 3 or more ice blocks with same flower. Breaking as many groups as possible until one column reaches the top of the screen.

Gear up for this exciting and addictive game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
★ Fun of ice breaking.
★ Very cute HD graphics.
★ High quality sound effects.
★ Game Center leaderboards.
★ Endless game, unlimited fun.
★ Retina display optimised.
★ Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch.
